mapper.insert: insert into cart (MEMBER_NUM, GOODS_NUM, CART_DATE, CART_QTY) values (#{memberNum}, #{goodsNum}, SYSDATE, #{cartQty})
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from cart where member_num = #{memberNum} and goods_num = #{goodsNum}
select goods_name, goods_contents, goods_price, cart_qty from cart c join goods g on g.goods_num = c.goods_num where member_num = #{memberNum} order by cart_num ASC
